key_dates.event: Original deed of trust executed and recorded
McCalla Raymer Leibert Pierce, LLP substituted as Trustee
Public auction sale of property at 11:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.

agency: Forrest County Chancery Clerk's Office, State of Mississippi
description: Notice of public foreclosure sale for a residential property in Petal, Mississippi, due to default on a mortgage deed of trust dated November 21, 2008. The property will be sold at public auction by Substitute Trustee Rubin Lublin, LLC.

key_dates.event: Deed of Trust recorded in Forrest County records
Public foreclosure sale at 11:00 AM - 4:00 PM at Paul B. Johnson Chancery Building

agency: Forrest County Chancery Clerk, State of Mississippi
description: Notice of public foreclosure sale of residential property located at 474 Old Corinth Road, Petal, MS due to default on a deed of trust executed in 2008. The property will be sold at public auction by Substitute Trustee Rubin Lublin, LLC.

key_dates.event: Deed of Trust recorded in Forrest County records

agency: Forrest County Chancery Clerk, State of Mississippi
description: Public notice of a substitute trustee's sale of real property in Forrest County, Mississippi due to default on a Deed of Trust dated March 14, 2007. The property will be sold at public auction on October 10, 2025.

agency: Forrest County Chancery Clerk, State of Mississippi
description: Notice of substitute trustee's public sale of real property in Forrest County, Mississippi due to default on a deed of trust dated March 14, 2007. The 5-acre property located at 84 Faye Lane, Hattiesburg will be sold at public auction on October 10, 2025.

key_dates.event: Deed of Trust recorded in Forrest County

agency: Chancery Court of Forrest County, Mississippi
description: Notice to creditors of the Estate of Anita Victoria Smith, Deceased, informing claimants they have 90 days from first publication to present claims to the court or be forever barred.

agency: Chancery Court of Forrest County, Mississippi
description: Notice to creditors of the estate of Anita Victoria Smith, deceased, requiring claims to be presented within 90 days of the first publication date or be forever barred.

key_dates.event: Deadline for creditors to present claims (90 days from first publication)

agency: Padgett Law Group (Substituted Trustee) / ServBank, N.A. (Beneficiary)
description: Notice of foreclosure sale for a residential property in Forrest County, Mississippi, due to default on a mortgage loan. The property will be sold at public auction on October 10, 2025.

Deed of Trust assigned to Nationstar Mortgage, LLC d/b/a Mr. Cooper
ServBank, N.A. appointed Padgett Law Group as Substitute Trustee
Public auction sale date (11:00 AM - 4:00 PM at Northeast rear entrance of Paul B. Johnson Chancery Building, Hattiesburg, Mississippi)

agency: Padgett Law Group (Substituted Trustee); ServBank, N.A. (Beneficiary)
description: Substitute trustee's notice of foreclosure sale for property in Forrest County, Mississippi, due to default on a deed of trust executed by Michael A. Lyon and Melissa L. Lyon. The property will be sold at public auction on October 10, 2025.

agency: Hattiesburg Public Schools
description: Request for sealed bids/proposals for 2025 lawn care services (Project B) for the Hattiesburg Public School District. Bids will be received until October 20, 2025, at 9:00 a.m. CST and opened publicly on the same date.

key_dates.event: Deadline for sealed bid submission at 9:00 a.m. CST
Public bid opening at 9:00 a.m. CST
90-day period after bid opening expires (bids cannot be withdrawn before this date)

agency: Mississippi Department of Environmental Quality (MDEQ) Permit Board
description: Hattiesburg South Lagoon is applying for reissuance of its Municipal NPDES permit to continue discharging treated domestic wastewater into Leaf River. The permit board is soliciting public comments on the draft permit and supporting documentation.

agency: Mississippi Department of Environmental Quality (MDEQ) Permit Board
description: Hattiesburg North Lagoon is applying for reissuance of its Municipal NPDES permit to continue discharging treated municipal wastewater into the Bowie River. The MDEQ is soliciting public comments on the draft permit during a 30-day review period.

key_dates.event: Public Comment Period End Date (30 days from start)

agency: Chancery Court of Forrest County, Mississippi
description: Legal summons for unknown heirs of Anita Victoria Smith's estate to appear in court and defend against a petition by S'Moyne Smith seeking to establish specific individuals as heirs at law.

agency: Chancery Court of Lamar County, Mississippi
description: Legal summons in an estate matter seeking to establish Bryan Esser, Justin Esser, Clayton Esser, and Brandon Esser as the sole heirs at law of deceased Mary Arlene Esser. Unknown heirs and other claimants to the estate are summoned to appear and defend their claims.

key_dates.event: Court appearance required at 9:00 a.m. in Perry County Chancery Court, New Augusta, Mississippi
